name: The Epic Character Build Search Engine is back!
author: Empyre65

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
Great news!! It has just been brought to my attention that the classic Epic Character Build Search Engine is back! Thanks Luck_Dragon for the find.
http://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/buil ... index.html

posts.author: Luck_Dragon
posts.content: Not a problem. Just hope it helps.

posts.author: madclawwookie
posts.content:
Yay!! Been hoping for this to happen.

Sent from my Z983 using Tapatalk

posts.author: Shia_Luck
posts.content:
Oh wow! This is excellent news! Thank you WoG for hosting it. :)

Have fun :)
